articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: The Victory In Amendment Four
articles.description: Rev. Al Sharpton is joined by NBC’s own Trymaine Lee to discuss the aftermath of the midterm elections and the passing of amendment four, which is poised to give voting access to over 1.4 million formerly incarcerated people in the state of Florida.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Tom Perez: “This is a constitutional crisis.”
articles.description: Rev. Al Sharpton is joined by DNC Chairman Tom Perez to discuss President Trumps new acting Attorney General Matthew Whitaker, and former Virginia Governor Terry McAuliffe clarifies his plans for 2020.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Blue Wave or Blue Trickle?
articles.description: Rev. Al Sharpton is joined by an expert panel of guests to discuss the aftermath of the midterm election. One of the topics is whether or not there was an actual “blue wave.”  Stacy Washington, Bill Press, and Michelle Goldberg weigh in.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: How Russia is responding to Democrats taking control of the House
articles.description: Former U.S. Ambassador to Russia, Michael McFaul,  MSNBC international analyst, says Russian media have an interesting take on Democrats winning back the House.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Will some newly-elected dems support Nancy Pelosi for speaker?
articles.description: Incoming freshman congresswoman Deb Haaland with her take on how democrats should approach President Trump and whether Nancy Pelosi should be speaker.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Who Won The Week?
articles.description: After an eventful seven days, Joy Reid asks her panel of experts one important question: who won the week? Michelle Bernard, Jennifer Rubin, and Maria Hinojosa weigh in.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: #MomentOfMaxine
articles.description: In this week’s #MomentOfMaxine, Congresswoman Maxine Waters talks about a new position within the House of Representatives, and responds to criticism from other legislators.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: The Trump Spars With Reporters
articles.description: President Trump’s longstanding feud with the press came to a head this week in a tirade against CNN’s Jim Acosta whose white house press credentials were revoked. As justification, Sarah Huckabee Sanders tweeted a doctored video of Acosta’s interaction with a…

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: California Wildfires
articles.description: As California wrestles with devastating wildfires, President Trump uses his twitter platform to attack both heroes and victims. And California’s fire fighter’s union responds, calling the President’s tweets shameful.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Michelle Obama: “I’d never forgive him.”
articles.description: In her book, “Becoming” Former First Lady Michelle Obama shares some intimate details about her experience in the white house. She recounts an event that she will never forgive President Trump for. Joy Reid and her panel of guests discuss. Michelle Bernard, J…

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Trump On The World Stage
articles.description: President Macron of France condemned nationalism in support of patriotism in a speech. Joy Reid and her expert panel of guest gather to discuss what this means for President Trump and his reputation from a global perspective. Natasha Bertrand, Jon Soltz, Keir…

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Were the voting machines cords "locked in the Closet?"
articles.description: MSNBC's David Gura and a panel of guests discuss Trump's claims of election fraud and whether or not those claims can be verified.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Mr. and Mrs. Kelly Anne Conway Criticize Pres. Trump?
articles.description: MNSBC's David Gura and his panel of guests discuss the Conway's criticisms of the President  and debate whether or not Kelly Anne Conway is truly a Republican role model.
